item.description: Have you ever looked for a word in “The Official CHAMORRO-ENGLISH Dictionary”? Take for instance the following set of words pulled directly from the dictionary mentioned above Here we see that kamuti comes before kÃ¥myu which comes before kana'. At first glance it doesn’t seem to be an issue: “m” does come before “n”.
